snippet: Meetings and phone calls to influential donors and fund-raisers reflect Hollywood’s new importance in the president’s re-election campaign.
abstract: Pres Obama and his representatives have held a series of meetings and telephone calls with some of Hollywood's most influential donors and fund-raisers, reflecting the new importance of a region he once eschewed; Obama's endorsement of marriage equality is likely to increase his popularity in Hollywood.

byline.original: By ADAM NAGOURNEY and JIM RUTENBERG

lead_paragraph: Meetings and phone calls to influential donors and fund-raisers reflect Hollywood’s new importance in the president’s re-election campaign.

headline.main: Obama’s New Courting of Hollywood Pays Off
headline.print_headline: Obama’s New Courting Of Hollywood Pays Off

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
